metadata.title: CVE-2014-2905 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: fish (aka fish-shell) 1.16.0 before 2.1.1 does not properly check thecredentials, which allows local users to gain privileges via the universalvariable socket, related to /tmp/fishd.socket.user permissions.

criterions.comment: fish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
